headline: Halliburton (HAL) Ascends But Remains Behind Market: Some Facts to Note

headline: Think Twice About Buying the 20% YTD Dip in Halliburton Stock
summary: HAL's significant exposure to the North American market - where approximately 40% of its revenues are generated - poses a key risk.
